website_summaries.verdict: Typical whiteboard with a magnetic backing. Can easily stick papers and notes onto the board alongside written notes and drawings.
pros: A larger 3 x 2-foot surface offers extra space
We love how it comes with an easy hanging kit with extra mounts to simplify the installation process
cons: The magnetic backing might feel weak depending on the quality of magnets you use

customer_reviews.title: Best Whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: The board came packaged so well I thought I had ordered a size larger than intended! It is lightweight and thin, but not so thin that it bends or warps. Solid writing surface. Came with two hangers, tray, eraser, pen, and two magnets. Not heavy on our wall. Markers glide with ease and the eraser leaves nothing behind. We use for homework. Having this size board for spelling words, etc...has helped cut homework time. We have a 1st grader. Sometimes they need the visual aid to help transition to homework papers. If I need future magnetic white boards I will come back to this brand and seller. Cannot say enough good things abt this board.
customer_reviews.author: ASConner

customer_reviews.title: Set up was quick and pretty self explanatory
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these whiteboards and they came quickly. Customer service seems to be very helpful and wanting to make sure everything goes as smoothly as possible. Set up was quick and pretty self explanatory. The pen holder and clips that get screwed to the wall are easily clipped on. The pen and eraser that come with this work great and the magnets are a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: The item works great and is durable
customer_reviews.text: Soon after ordering this item I received a follow up email from the seller checking in on the item making sure it had arrived satisfactorily. The item works great and is durable. I tried to hang it on the wall about 5.5 feet up from the ground and it fell receiving only a palm sized dent in a back corner that you can't notice from the front. The included magnetic eraser and pen are good quality for being included for free. I've been using this item to help keep track of many different responsibilities, tasks, and school work. It has helped me organize myself better than before.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Lemus

customer_reviews.title: Great whiteboard!
customer_reviews.text: Whiteboard arrived well packaged and was as described on the sales entry. Mounting plugs, screws and brackets included were easy to install. Very happy with the purchase and consider the product to be very good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: nice dry erase board
customer_reviews.text: nice dry erase board, it will come in handy for my pre-calculus homework.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: If it is broken or you want to return, you CANNOT!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would've known that this product could not be returned. I would have went with another seller/product. Got it and the box was damaged. I opened it up and the corner was chipped and there are scratches on it. Now I don't know what to do with it. Since I do not want the eye sore in my house, I will be at least donating it. I would not buy this product and do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I just got this and used it to study for gross anatomy. I drew and labeled the structures I was studying, took a photo, and then erased the labels and quizzed myself. This board is my new favorite study tool. Its huge, but I love it so much that I actually carried it with me to the library. Several classmates are going to order one now. Plus it's great quality! I use expo markers and no residue at all is left on the board when I erase it. I expect this to last me throughout dental school and beyond!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good surface for writing
customer_reviews.text: Arrived exactly as described. Good surface for writing. I especially likes that the hangers could slide easily back and forth along the top. We had two nails already in our wall, and it was very easy to line it up to hang on the preexisting nails.
customer_reviews.author: GNapier

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The first board I received was damaged in shipping. The seller contacted me just to see how I liked the product and when I told them about the damage they immediately responded and expedited a replacement the same day. The board is a great size, slim, and I like that the whole thing is magnetic. Great quality and great price; the customer service was superb!
customer_reviews.author: kflo416

customer_reviews.title: We got this for our homeschool and it is PERFECT! The markers come off easily
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our homeschool and it is PERFECT! The markers come off easily, nothing is left behind (maybe a slight "shadow" of what you wrote, but nothing major). Even if you forget to erase something and it stays for a little longer than intended, it doesn't stick. We love the magnetic eraser. Super handy, especially when our tray is full of markers, ha! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my home office!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect size, easy to hang/mount, marker and eraser work perfectly and less expensive than big box store. Solid feeling - great quality and service/delivery were spot on. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Kenstrodamus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome board for 6th grade math
customer_reviews.text: Awesome board for 6th grade math. Easily to hang or store away. Makes learning much more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mouth

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Love this board! The 2' x 3' board was a birthday gift :) The magnetic feature is great! I never lose the eraser or markers, and the button magnets hold my paper notes and memos. The movable hangers made it easy to put the screws securely in wall studs while allowing me to center the board in the wall space available. I slid the 18 inch marker tray to the right-hand side of the board so that it would not interfere with me opening my file cabinet drawer on the left-hand side of the board. This board allows me to tidy up and organize my workspace so I can be more productive. No complaints. It's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Annette L. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great board and customer service
customer_reviews.text: We love this whiteboard- good quality and great price! The original board arrived with a dent due to the delivery service, however, once I talked to the company, they sent out a replacement immediately and it arrived perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: This is a NICE, magnetic, dry erase board
customer_reviews.text: This is a NICE, magnetic, dry erase board. It is SLIM at 3/4" thick, with good quality construction. It arrived packed well with no damage or warping. It came with 1 magnetic eraser, 1 dry erase pen with magnetic cap, and 3 magnets, along with the mounting tabs, drywall anchors and screws. It took about 5 minutes to mount. Tools needed are: drill/drill bit, level and philips screwdriver. The mounting tabs are adjustable, which makes it super easy to mount! I highly recommend purchasing this product, if you're looking for an affordable, yet durable, Magnetic Dry Erase Board. I will be buying another one of these soon for my girlfriend's home office.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Miller

customer_reviews.title: We like the white board very much
customer_reviews.text: I had responded earlier with a review from my office email account. All is well. We like the white board very much.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product and Service
customer_reviews.text: This Board is just amazing!! Came with everything that was advertised and i hung it up on my wall no problem. They even reached out to me via email after to make sure there was nothing wrong and that i was completely satisfied, and i was! 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Billy R.

customer_reviews.title: No problems. Happy w/purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great. Fit the area I wanted. I liked the price, came in excellent condition. I also liked that it came with a tray and magnets. I use it for homeschooling.
customer_reviews.author: raneydae

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this white board
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this white board. It is very easy to hang either portrait or landscape - the tray and hangers just clip onto the frame. I didn't want to poke holes in the wall so I used Command hooks and it working very well. No staining with Expo markers after a week - haven't had to use any cleaner. Love that it is magnetic, too!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Overall, I'm very pleased with the board.
customer_reviews.text: My whiteboard arrived quickly, and though the box was very scrunched in one corner, the inner packaging protected the whiteboard. It is a solid whiteboard. The accessories are nothing fancy, but they do the trick. The pen and the eraser are both magnetic. Along with the three included magnets, they are all on the weaker side magnetically-speaking, but the magnets will hold several sheets of paper up just fine. The tray and the two hooks on which to hang the whiteboard feel very light plastic, and give the impression of not being sturdy or solid, but attached properly they do their jobs nicely, and securely. Overall, I'm very pleased with the board.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution for Organizing tasks
customer_reviews.text: This board is terrific. Great size for the price, even came with molly screws for wall, although isn't that heavy. Love that it came with magnets and separate eraser as well as the marker. Well packaged. We will be using this for house projects and reminders.
customer_reviews.author: Michele G. Fuqua

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, simple and great price!
customer_reviews.text: This board is exactly what I needed! Very light weight and easily hangable anywhere. It's of very good quality. I love that there were both magnetic eraser and magnetic marker given along with it. Definitely handy for forgetful people like me. most importantly good stuffs for a great price! Thanks! Highly recommended for someone looking for boards easily portable.
customer_reviews.author: gangeshwari

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good and it was very easy to hang it on ...
customer_reviews.text: The dry-erae board came in the mail a couple of days ago. The quality is very good and it was very easy to hang it on the wall. I'm preparing for an exam so it's the best way for me to practice and solve problems!
customer_reviews.author: A.G

customer_reviews.title: Great white board!
customer_reviews.text: This white board is top quality! It looks great on our barn wall - perfect for keeping track of all the horses and their individual feed and supplements.
customer_reviews.author: B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: so for the price it was a great deal. It also arrived in a very timely ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is a college student and wanted a white board to do her planning. It is large, but because it is magnetic she will be able to hang photos and decorations as well. It came with an eraser, tray, and pen which others don't, so for the price it was a great deal. It also arrived in a very timely manner and in excellent condition. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Norbert's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good vendor
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the product. The irregular size was a perfect fit for the space I had available! Also I had accidently thrown away one of the hanging pieces to the board. I emailed the company and they were gracious and quite helpful! This sell also didn't bother me about writing a review, they seemed like they legitimately wanted to satisfy their customer. I highly recommend using this vendor
customer_reviews.author: JJ p.

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure How This Passed QC...
customer_reviews.text: This product probably would have been fine if it hadn't been a huge wrinkle running right down the middle of it. Not sure how this thing passed QC. It looks like the build quality is good. Has lots of good hanging options. Slim. Light weight. And a big wrinkle in it making it totally useless & unusable. I can't recommend this product to anyone if they are shipping out defective boards.
customer_reviews.author: AL FITZGERALD

customer_reviews.title: OfficePro Ultra-Slim, Lightweight Magnetic[[ASIN:B018RWQD9Y Highest Quality Dry Erase Board Whiteboard Kit: (1) 24" x 36"
customer_reviews.text: OfficePro Ultra-Slim, Lightweight Magnetic... Dry erase board Is great. Nice and big. with magnetic eraser and 3 magnets. Arrived undamaged. I give it 5 stars for everything. I would get again if I needed more.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good white board for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good white board for the price. It's not super high quality, and the hanging system is a little lame, but for the price, it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: David Wall

customer_reviews.title: I installed the cheap one from Walmart and immediately disliked the quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this then stopped at Walmart and found the same size white board for $17. So, with intentions of returning this one to Amazon, I installed the cheap one from Walmart and immediately disliked the quality. This board arrived the next day and I decided to give it a try (only because I wouldn't have got my money back for shipping if I returned it) and wow, the quality was so much better and sturdier. It doesn't wobble when it's written in and the marker/eraser holder is nice and wide without protruding. I'm on my way to return the cheap Walmart one now!
customer_reviews.author: A L

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was wanting for my homeschool room! The quality is wonderful. My boys already enjoy drawing on it :)
customer_reviews.author: miz_cox

customer_reviews.title: It is really nice!! The size is just what I was ...
customer_reviews.text: It is really nice!! The size is just what I was looking for. It was easy to install and it looks great! I couldn't have found a better deal. I admit that I was a little scare of getting it online because sometimes people are not careful handling big things, so I was so nervous waiting for it. The package was excellent and it was protected completely. I love it :)
customer_reviews.author: K James

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased With My Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a whiteboard to keep track of daily goals etc. But I wasn't looking to spend a ton of money. This was exactly what I needed. It is a great quality product, large, slim and easy to hang. I especially like that it is versatile. I originally ordered it to hang horizontally, but was just slightly too large to fit in the predetermined space. However, with a few adjustments I was able to hang it vertically w/o any issues. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Z.

customer_reviews.title: So far excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Product is as advertised. Mounting would be simple with included hardware. Can be vertical or landscape. Since I'm mounting this to a door I just used large sized command hooks to mount rather than putting holes in the door. Have not used a marker on it yet so will update review if there is anything negative to report. Comes with a magnetic eraser magnetic fine pen and three magnetic holders for paper. Lifetime warranty is a big plus hope to never need it but if I do hope the customer service is as good as the product seems.
customer_reviews.author: miike

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Whiteboard arrived with a huge bend from top to bottom. Totally unusable. Sending it back. Should’ve listened to the bad reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Vishnesky

customer_reviews.title: ... for this school year and this is such an awesome addition to our classroom space
customer_reviews.text: We are homeschooling just for this school year and this is such an awesome addition to our classroom space!!! Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Christine Moore-McPeak

customer_reviews.title: Do not use the magnets that come with the board!
customer_reviews.text: So, this might be a nice board. It looked good when it went up - slim, lightweight. One day after putting it on the wall (and only using it one time), I noticed marks on the board. I thought it was dry erase marker and tried to clean it off. It turns out the marks are deep scratches from the "free" magnets that came with the board. If you look at the back side of the magnets, they do have a rough metal edge. The board is completely ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: measurements are not accurate as described
customer_reviews.text: not actually 24x36, it's actually about half an inch short on all sides. I was hoping to reframe this into a gold frame, but it's too small for the frame because the measurements are listed incorrectly. very frustrating as my return window has already ended. also, the screws around the frame arrived completely bare and jammed in (like someone banged them up with a hammer or something), so they were impossible to remove (which I needed for my project). bad product, poor quality, do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RangersJets

customer_reviews.title: Standard Expo markers cannot be erased
customer_reviews.text: The surface is not smooth like other whiteboards I've seen, but has a bit of a "texture" to it. Standard Expo markers stained the board and cannot be erased.
customer_reviews.author: FearFox

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on wall
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible Expo board!! The small cheap plastic clips that are used to hang the board to the wall do not work! Its constantly falling down. Also, the Expo markers stain the white board, I had to use alcohol to erase it.
customer_reviews.author: Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great Board, Well Made, Sturdy and Great Size!
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic dry-erase board was exactly what my son wanted for his dorm to post his mathematical formulas and assignments on and it is very well made and came with everything that he needed to use it effectively. He mounted the board on his wall with 3M hooks using screw hooks to anchor it due to the policy of "no holes" in the dorm walls (completely understandable). He tends to be very selective about the quality of everything and really thought this board was "all of that." I highly recommend this item to anyone who is looking to purchase one and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P

customer_reviews.title: Great Big Board
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge and the accessories it come with make it a great value. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan harris

customer_reviews.title: Giant crease in the middle of the whiteboard. Pictures speak for themselves. Bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Whiteboard arrived w/ a giant crease in the middle. Pictures speak for themselves...Bad Quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY/10
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to install and works for exactly what i bought it for. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Chris Terry

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with scratches
customer_reviews.text: I opened it, unwrapped it, and put it on an easel, opened the Expo brand dry erase markers, and started writing. After about 10-15 minutes, I erased the board and saw four black scratch marks. They are visible from 2-3 feet away but not farther. I know these things can get scratched due to pointing devices or jewelry. The only things that touched this were Expo markers, eraser, and fingers. I'm assuming it arrived with scratches but weren't visible until the black marker got inside them. There may be even more scratches yet to be found. I'm still debating on if it's worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Bad value
customer_reviews.text: Not what is advertised. The long tray shown for the first picture is false. You actually get a wide short tray. I asked about an additional tray and was told to look at local stores (so don’t buy from Amazon I guess). The mounting hardware is flimsy, the metal screws don’t really hold the plastic brackets and the brackets don’t hold the board. There is ghosting. Totally not worth $50. Look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: chaz

customer_reviews.title: SUCH a a big help
customer_reviews.text: Dad has to have a white/writing board to communicate as he is now legally deaf. With a white board we communicate much better. This nice big one is for his room to help him remember at 91 what his upcoming appointments are, and he writes us questions he doesn't want to forget to ask us. I have a white board at home that I use all the time. This one is magnetic, I really wish my home one was. I sent dad some nice strong magnets to use so he can put up anything he wants.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for lists and reminders as we didn't want to keep buying paper notes, and it works really well. Came with everything listed (3 magnets, 1 pen, 1 eraser) and included the 'mounting pieces' and shelf. Very sturdy and heavy; the only complaint I have is that the mounting hooks did not want to stay on the back of the board. They would pop into place, but then would 'pop' off just as easily...we had to secure everything with a hot glue gun, and its holding nicely! Overall, not a bad purchase, just issues with the mounting brackets is all.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Large whiteboard at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The whiteboard itself is excellent and totally makes it worth the cost. The included accessories are mediocre. Get some nice Expo markers and a better eraser. Installation is about as difficult as mounting a curtain rod. The main challenge is getting it straight. You'll need a level of some sort for sure. With a level and a straight edge, I managed to get it. I also opted to swap out the provided screws and anchors for some longer screws that could penetrate the drywall and bite into the studs. Sheet metal type screws with large heads are your friend here as you're screwing down a flat surface (the mounts that hold the board up) with larger than necessary holes.
customer_reviews.author: Rob R.

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic, sturdy, unpretentious
customer_reviews.text: All whiteboards should be magnetic. You can buy those magnetic flat cell phone mounts, stick them on various wireless devices/remotes/office supplies, and hang whatever you want from the whiteboards surrounding your desk. So much convenience. Trying to decide which size whiteboard you need? Pick the larger one. I bought two of these whiteboards and am very pleased. Solid but not too heavy, tray is a good size, feels like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: it's a nice board.
customer_reviews.text: I had to go to the hardware store to get larger screws and washers in order to hang it because the tops of the screws were so small that they went right through the hangers. Then, after using the board just one time yesterday and erasing it this morning, this was left all down the board because there was a sticky substance on it that I couldn't see when I hung the board. I gently used a Clorox wipe and it came off - now I'm just hoping that didn't damage the surface. If it did, I'll be asking for a replacement from the seller. Other than these two issues, it's a nice board.
customer_reviews.author: mncamper

customer_reviews.title: Great board
customer_reviews.text: I was not going to spend this much but after reading some reviews and comparing a few others I decided to go with this one. It is an excellent board, very well made and worth the extra. Writing is clear and it hung easily, I hung it horizontally on my office door and it fits perfectly. I used a little velcro to hold it firmly. I also bought a multi-pack of colored markers that are magnetic. This board has made my life easier at work, I write reminders, lists of orders, parts I need to order, etc.... It just makes my job easier and more organized and it is a good quality board.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Product came in neatly packaged to avoid damage, i absolutely love this board, i had to find another solution to work with my 8 year old on homework, as me standing over top of her trying to write things down on paper, just flustered her even more. Which I’ve realized it was well worth the investment. Its more interactive for her, and Fun. The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is it definitely needs more than the 2 hanging brackets it came with. It being a rather large board, 4 brackets would hold it to the drywall without fear of falling. So I improvised with 2 screws for it to sit on, and the 2 brackets up top.
customer_reviews.author: william n leeser

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Very light and easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: Over all, this is a good product. I added a couple clips at the bottom to aid stability. These are just bent 1/8 X 1/2 inch aluminum strap from the hardware store. The instructions imply that the mounting hangers and tray are to be snaped in but it is easier if they are slipped in from the end of the frames.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the white board
customer_reviews.text: Love the white board. Seems to be good quality and holding up nicely. Only downfall was when we opened the package, the tray was broken. The magnetic eraser, marker and extra magnets are a nice addition to the bundle. I would highly recommend buying actual dry erase markers through as the little marker won't last that long. Sometimes using a board cleaner helps remove marker that has been on the board for a length of time.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: This is a great whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: While buying whiteboard from Amazon, I was skepticle as for several other whitboards review had this common theme that people received whiteboard in damaged condition. However this whiteboard reviews were different, I did not see a single review which says they received damaged. So I ordered it and was glad that I did. The order was delivered in a properly padded package and without any single wear or tear. It is a really ncie board to use. I mounted it in my wall and really liking it.
customer_reviews.author: Onik

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today 8-11-20 and it has a dent in it. It is non refundable so I am stuck with it. Just be aware that you may get a faulty product and you will be stuck with it. I can still use it, no damage to the face of the board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great white board for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This white board is awesome!! Wanted something to practice my organic chemistry on and generally organize my tasks and this is just the right size. The marker holder is a plus. The eraser it comes with is good, and the magnet on it is strong. The board erases cleanly. The silver boarder looks sophisticated. Putting it up was a breeze. I had writing on it for over a week and just went to go erase it and it came off without any "ghosting" left behind, great! This is top notch quality, definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Ad
customer_reviews.text: I put in a search for a 48 x 36 magnetic dry erase board, this came up but when you chose it the price was for a 24 x 36 which I accidently ordered thinking it matched my search. I had to change my size when ordered from 24 x 36 to 48 x 36 and instead of $50, it would now be $89. I tried to return but it is non returnable. I hate deceptive advertising!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Frawley

customer_reviews.title: More dents than board
customer_reviews.text: Came with dents in the aluminum border and dents in the whiteboard. One large dent / crease is six inches long. It's a shiny large white thing so every ripple dent and crease shows up like crazy. I've already mounted it and can't be bothered taking it back down and packing it up to return so I'll just sit here at my desk glaring at it in distain until I find a decent whiteboard that doesn't look like I pulled it out of a dumpster. Also, what's with the tiny tray?
customer_reviews.author: 27Bslash6

customer_reviews.title: Great for displaying souvenir magnets!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for to display my souvenir magnets. It was easy to assemble if you don't mind the tabs showing. We tried to mount it without the tabs showing and we couldn't do it, but other than that, which is pretty minor, it is great! This is a project I've had on hold for forever and I finally finished last night! I did a lot of research before I decided on these white boards. I bought a 48 X 36 and a 24X36. The packaging was excellent for both, both easy to assemble and they look awesome. I am very happy with these purchases...you will be too.
customer_reviews.author: Fabiola H

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with mounting hardware!
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with mounting hardware! I wanted to hang this in my office, and now I have to go to a hardware store or something. This did not arrive with any kind of mounting kit. Not what I thought I was paying for.
customer_reviews.author: George Matthew Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight quality board
customer_reviews.text: Great board that is lightweight enough to hang with command strips. The mounting clips can pop off pretty easy but once placed on the wall, they stay on just fine. They are adjustable too so you can place them wherever on the edge of the board. I like the tray at the bottom to hold an eraser and markers. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: The 24” by 36” boards are great; the 12” by 18” boards, not so much
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of the 24” by 36” dry erase boards, and one 12” by 18” dry erase board. The 24” by 36” boards are great, and arrived in pristine condition. The 12” by 18” board arrived scratched up even before I unwrapped the plastic, which was disappointing, given my experience with the larger boards. As a result, I’m a little skeptical of the scratch resistance of the dry erase surface on boards of both sizes.
customer_reviews.author: G. Oxberry

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Product.
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic whiteboard board was just what I was looking for for teaching purposes! It can be displayed either verticaly or horizontally, removable marker tray also accommodates this feature. Because it is magnetic, its versatility quotient increased its value in my opinion. It is a great tool to add to my portable bag of tricks.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dry erase board for my remote kindergarten classroom. It costs a bit more than others on the market, but it's well worth it. It was simple to mount onto my wooden easel. The marker tray can easily slide onto either the long or short side of the board. And my Expo markers erase immediately, even when the writing has been sitting on the board over the weekend. I've been writing on it every day for three weeks, and haven't had to wash it yet.
customer_reviews.author: KTeacherNYC

customer_reviews.title: Hanging brackets are just cheap plastic and will not last
customer_reviews.text: Hanging brackets are made with cheap plastic and the pen tray is also made with cheap plastic. I am not sure how long the 11 lbs board will stay on those plastic brackets without any bottom support. I need to buy a piece of wood or something to put underneath to make it sturdy. I shouldn't have trusted the reviews before I checked the material of the product. The reviews are deceiving, not putting any realistic consideration into how the board would be installed with this cheap plastic. This is plain common sense that this plastic will not hold this board for very long. Everything else is fine.
customer_reviews.author: shafiq rhaman

customer_reviews.title: Misleading size
customer_reviews.text: The board is smaller than the advertised size. Surprisingly, they have pictures on amazon.com, showing inside dimension as 36x24 inches - which was the decision factor for me to buy the board. Even the outside dimensions are about half inch less on both width and height.
customer_reviews.author: Atul Mukker

customer_reviews.title: Great Board
customer_reviews.text: I'm someone that was looking to get a porcelain board, but at the end of the day I'm a college student. Not having the money to buy a really nice board i decided to go with this board which compared to the 100+ dollar porcelain board was fairly cheap. I thought it to be a bit risky due to my belief that cheap boards were generally flimsy. I purchased it anyways because I had not much to loose, and now I'm here leaving a positive review because this board was definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Noe

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a decently large whiteboard for use in my home office. Nothing too small or obnoxiously big. This is a great size, and I chose to mount it with two command hooks along with the hooks it came with, as I'm in a rental. With a little extra tack lower down the whiteboard, it sits perfectly on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: LemonHoneyTea

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: There doesn’t seem to be anyway to contact OfficePro to order additional accessories or mounting hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Like it very much, reservations about assembly
customer_reviews.text: The board itself is good - sturdy, nice looking, does what it’s supposed to do. The issue I have is with the assembly. The instructions are pictures only, no text. So it took me a bit before I understood it. Also, the instructions show having to use an electric drill to start the drywall plugs, a tool I don’t have. I ended up doing without it, just hammering in two large head nails. Seems to work fine - the board is very lightweight. So I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter1

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Simple assembly. Easy to hang,easy to take down and magnetic. Exactly as advertised. The only short coming is that the plastic hooks that it comes with are a little flimsy and loose fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Ericd

customer_reviews.title: very nice board. way cheaper than staples!!!
customer_reviews.text: White board showed up on time and in good condition. It looks just like it appears and is a good size. Easily hanging and they supply 2 screws for that. The only thing, and it's no big deal, but the magnets do not feel smooth, so when I moved them on the board, I felt like they were scratching the board. I won't use them. Again, not a big deal. I have plenty of magnets. Love the magnet though. bought dry erase markers with magnets in them so they stick..
customer_reviews.author: ASZ

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable!
customer_reviews.text: This item came with a huge dent down the entire white board. This item is not returnable either, so now I’m stuck with it. Honestly don’t understand the great reviews. Even without the dent, not worth $40.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy; parts slide or snap together. Mounting was simply driving two screws into the wall; the hooks slide sideways to match the location of screws, so no detailed measurements were needed. It is plenty sturdy for light home use. (It just hangs like a picture on the wall, so might not be good for rough use.)
customer_reviews.author: TexasTen

customer_reviews.title: Great board for vertical or horizontal mounting
customer_reviews.text: Great magnetic/dry-erase board. Can be mounted vertically or horizontally. Dry-erase markers erase easily. Only minus: ours arrived well packed, with all corners protected and slim foam pieces on each side, but it had a slight indent in the middle nonetheless – nothing too noticeable, so we chose to keep it, but product would benefit from improved packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Elle M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome whiteboard! Definitely worth the extra $5-10 than other common popular brands
customer_reviews.text: Board arrived in good condition. The packaging was pretty good. I really liked the design and quality of the board. The other accessories like marker holder, eraser and marker were also good. It's definitely worth the money. I purchased a Quartet whiteboard on Walmart website few days before I bought this one. It was cheaper by about $10. However, the board was defective in one of the corners, and the board plus the back frame supporting it didn't seem sturdy. I returned it and bought this Officepro board and was quite satisfied. It's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Vignesh V.

customer_reviews.title: Good whiteboard, bad mounting system.
customer_reviews.text: It's a whiteboard, exactly as you would expect. Keep in mind it is large and awkward and a bit heavy. Trying to get it up with the items included was impossible and left me almost in tears and my boyfriend had to stop and remember to breathe several times before we completely gave up on the included mounting system and devised our own. I took away some starts for how absolutely frustrating it was to try and mount this thing, but once it's up it's perfect and exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Dakotah W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Office
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this whiteboard. It hung up easily with the included hardware and the included magnetic eraser is really convenient. My dry-erase markers write cleanly on it and erase well without scrubbing. I like being able to attach documents with magnets. While the magnets that come with it are cheap, they do the trick (it came with three small black plastic magnets). I also like the flexibility of being about to attach the marker tray on any side of the board, which gives you the freedom to hang the board however you want.
customer_reviews.author: A. Leigh Ford

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying this product after reading all the reviews because I was worried that I might end up getting a broken or dent whiteboard. I don’t think the problem is with the manufacturer or the quality of the product. I think it is the people that do the delivery that mishandle this product. Mine came in a very good condition and and quality is very good. It was everything I needed
customer_reviews.author: HoneyPuff🥰😍😘❤️

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home schooling, book study groups and other light use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help me teach my daughter during the COVID-19 shutdown. It's exactly what we needed and it's lightweight enough to hang on the wall without having to use wall anchors. Big bonus is the magnetic quality. Super pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: GeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Good whiteboard for the price, but slightly smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: I'll start by saying that I am happy with the white board, and for the price, it is certainly a good buy. It was packaged well enough to protect the front of the board, which is most important. However, for those of you that might be interested, the board is slightly smaller than the advertised size, and is almost one inch shy in both height and width. This doesn't bother me, but I felt it was worth letting others know in the event they are bothered by this sort of thing. All of that being said, I'd buy this board again if I needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: SpartanAlto

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised.  Excellent experience!
customer_reviews.text: Fast, free UPS shipping. Adequately packaged. Everything in the box. Works, and looks nice. What's not to like.
customer_reviews.author: V G-Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great great great!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, and nice size. I am teaching French at home so this is a good additional tool for my students. Easy to install and very (nicely) glossy. I bought separately a pack of multicolor water markers and a liquid that cleanes in depth, you need it from time to time. Very nice little company, they are actually concerned if you've had a good experience with their product amd they offer a lifetime warranty which is not common for office supplies.
customer_reviews.author: lily-and-bloom, NYC

customer_reviews.title: It looks like excellent quality and is now placed high enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: This white board was larger than I thought, but obviously that was my error. This was a gift for my son and daughter-in-law as a replacement for their old one. They use it for grocery lists, to do list, and many other items they need to remember. It looks like excellent quality and is now placed high enough to keep the little ones from scratching it or using permanent markers!!
customer_reviews.author: K LTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my office
customer_reviews.text: This was such a good investment and its definitely going to help boost my productivity. Shipping was great and there were no damages done to the product. I love how it's really easy to write on. It took me a little while to install the tray for the markers but I figured it out later. Also not a big fan on the design of the eraser but it gets the job done. Overall this was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Just a user

customer_reviews.title: Great board.
customer_reviews.text: The board is great. It came with the magnets, marker, and eraser as described. It is lightweight, and thin. The marker tray sticks out kind of far, but that is a bit unavoidable. I like the board and would buy it again if I ever wanted another.
customer_reviews.author: K8lin DB

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: A nice, large dry erase board with a metal back that allows magnets to stick. Easy to install. You'll want to buy separate markers- the board only comes with one small black marker. Eraser works well and is magnetic. Images are a little off- the tray for markers and what-not is only about a foot and a half long. It does work on either a long or short side, but comes nowhere near the full length of the board either way.
customer_reviews.author: S.E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Surprising quality, sturdy feel and performs fully as expected...
customer_reviews.text: It was surprisingly weighty out of the box suggesting quality and it was an easy install that required simply 2 drill holes in your wall. It feels very sturdy on the wall despite having only two screws and my expo dry erase boards write properly on it like it should. I am pleasantly surprised so far by the product and it seems to be a quality whiteboard to own so far. I will return to this review if there is any reason to change this full endorsement but so far it lives up to the idea of what a prototypical whiteboard should be in everyone's minds when they think of one.
customer_reviews.author: RealTalkbutConsiderate

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble and Use Whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: This whiteboard was very easy to assemble, very light weight so it was easy for me to put hang it and is wonderful to keep track of items. It cleans up easily and has a nice shelf to hold the eraser and pen. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to keep an eye on my metrics. Now that they are visible everyday throughout the day I know where I stand instead of using a spreadsheet or a piece of paper. Installation was simple and it arrived damage free.
customer_reviews.author: DL Houston

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for home use.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for home use. Somewhat lightweight for business. (But still usable). I mounted so the fasteners didnt show, nice, clean installation on side of kitchen. Will get good use on the board for many years.
customer_reviews.author: enigma-2

customer_reviews.title: Good board, more brackets needed
customer_reviews.text: The board was as advertised. A small amount of assembly required. After the assembly, I realized that there were only two brackets so I was able to hang the board, however, the underside of the board wasn't able to be connected. The board hugs the wall pretty well, so it usually isn't a problem when writing. It would be great if they include four brackets with the board so it can be put on the wall sturdily
customer_reviews.author: Syed A. Abbas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, but I couldn't figure out how to attach the tray
customer_reviews.text: The white board is great. I love the size of it; it's perfect for our home office. The only thing that keeps me from giving it 5 stars is that I absolutely could not figure out how to get the tray attached to the board. The instructions simply had a drawing, but it was of no help to me. I couldn't get it on, and that was one of the main things that attracted me to this particular board. Oh well. At least the marker and eraser is magnetic, so they stay on the board that way. All in all, I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and affordable for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: It's light weight because it had a card board core between two thin sheets of metallic material. It's cheap for a reason folks, do you need me to spell it out, the reason it is cheap is because the material it is made out of is mostly air. It serves it's purpose. And that is all.
customer_reviews.author: R.N.R.N.

customer_reviews.title: Great size! Smooth, mount kit included !
customer_reviews.text: Clean and smooth ! Packaged well, mount kit comes with it!! Perfect size for home office. Look no further. This is the board you’re looking for to organize school, home, or work projects. **** UPDATE: Almost exactly 2 YEARS LATER and still works great!! The finish held up very well and I still use it almost everyday. I would buy this same board again when I need to or as a gift. ****
customer_reviews.author: Cadence

customer_reviews.title: As of May 2019, I found Big Box Blue Store has very simiar item for $15
customer_reviews.text: This item works as expected; however, the huge Big Blue Box store has a similar item for $15 before tax. The one at Big Blue does not include marker holder or eraser, but does include 2 magnets and a thin black marker. I picked up 2 more from Big Blue.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for the size - I will be returning it
customer_reviews.text: Not realizing the size of it before I purchased it is my own fault. It clearly advertised the size. But once I got it and could see how small it was for $35 - I immediately decided to return it. So once this pandemic is over, I will be returning this. I found one at Walmart 3 or 4 times bigger for $17.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed!! Not as shown on the website. The pen / eraser tray that attaches to the bottom of the board, does not go from end to end as shown. The tray that attaches to the board is only about half as long as the board when in landscape orientation. Expected it to be as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Digger80

product_meta.title: Officeline Ultra-Slim, Lightweight Magnetic Dry Erase Board & Accessories (Includes Whiteboard Pen & Pen Tray, 3 x Magnets & Eraser) (24 x 36 Inch)
feature_bullets: HIGH CLARITY, SCRATCH-RESISTANT MAGNETIC DRY ERASE BOARD: Write, erase and write again on your 24 X 36 INCH white board. Do it over and over. The Officeline Slimline Magnetic Dry Erase Board stays white, making your words easy to see and read.

SLIMLINE, LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN: The Officeline Slimline Magnetic Dry Erase Board features a lightweight but sturdy design that is guaranteed not to warp. All whiteboards are shipped in multi-layer reinforced padded shipping boxes for max protection.

PACKAGE INCLUDES EASY HANG MOUNTING KIT FOR HORIZONTAL OR VERTICAL MOUNTING: The Officeline mounting system allows you to install your magnetic board in a jiffy. Even a novice can hang this magnetic dry erase board with ease.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,840 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
